description: Verify visibility of Login page UI elements.
expected_result: Email, Password, Login now button, Forgot? link, Don't have an account? link, and Bala logo are visible.

description: Verify form validation for empty fields.
expected_result: Error messages or visual cues indicating required fields (Email and Password) are displayed.
Error message indicating invalid email format is displayed.
Password field input type changes to 'text' or shows password characters. Clicking again hides the password.

description: Verify navigation to Sign Up page.
expected_result: Sign Up page is displayed with expected elements (e.g., Login now button, Already have an account? link).

description: Verify navigation to Home page after successful login (mocked).
expected_result: Home page is displayed with expected elements (e.g., Search bar, categories, product listings).

description: Verify carousel navigation on Home page.
expected_result: Carousel slides to the next item.

description: Verify product cards are displayed on Home page.
expected_result: Product cards with images, titles, and prices are visible.

description: Verify search bar input and placeholder text.
expected_result: Search input field updates with the entered text.  Placeholder text disappears on input.

description: Verify navigation to a product category.
expected_result: Page navigates to the Electronics category or displays relevant filtering.
